```{r excel file, include=FALSE}
ppsc_inclusion <- read_excel(path = "I:\\Staff\\GSSW\\SALEM\\DATA ENTRY\\4. PPSC\\ZArchive\\PPSC DB 2021-23.xlsx",
                                   sheet = "Overall") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  select(cohort, id_trainers, id_students, id) %>%
```

Number of Respondents in Quarter: **`r number_respondents_inclusion`**

```{r}
ppsc_inclusion_labeled <- ppsc_inclusion %>% 
  mutate(id_trainers = recode(id_trainers, "1" = "Disagree",
                              "2" = "Somewhat Disagree",
                              "3" = "Neutral",
                              "4" = "Somewhat Agree",
                              "5" = "Agree")) %>% 
  mutate(id_students = recode(id_students, "1" = "Disagree",
                              "2" = "Somewhat Disagree",
                              "3" = "Neutral",
                              "4" = "Somewhat Agree",
                              "5" = "Agree"))

ppsc_inclusion_scales <- ppsc_inclusion_labeled %>%
  select(-id) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = -cohort,
               names_to = "scale",
               values_to = "rating",
               values_drop_na = TRUE)
```

```{r trainers, fig.height = 3.5, fig.width = 7}
ppsc_inclusion_scales %>%
  filter(cohort == params$cohort,
         scale == "id_trainers") %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  count(cohort, scale, rating) %>% 
  mutate(pct = n / sum(n)) %>% 
  mutate(rating = fct_relevel(rating, c("Agree",
                     "Somewhat Agree",
                     "Neutral",
                     "Somewhat Disagree",
                     "Disagree")),
         rating = fct_explicit_na(rating, na_level = "missing")) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = pct,
             y = rating,
             fill = rating)) +
    scale_fill_manual(values = c(
                     "Agree" = psu_green,
                     "Somewhat Agree" = psu_electricgreen,
                     "Neutral" = psu_sand,
                     "Somewhat Disagree" = psu_yellow,
                     "Disagree" = psu_orange)) +
  geom_col(show.legend = TRUE,
           position = "dodge") +
  geom_text(aes(label = scales::percent(pct, accuracy = 1)),
            color = "black",
            hjust = -0.2,
            size = 3) +
  scale_x_continuous(expand = expansion(add = c(0,0.2)),
                     labels = NULL) +
  labs(title = "I felt respected based on my identities by <span style = 'color: #008ac1'>trainers/staff</span>",
       fill = "") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
        axis.title = element_blank(),
        plot.title = element_markdown(face = "bold"))
```

### Open-Ended Question Responses

*Responses on Scale Questions*

```{r agree/somewhat agree responses}
ppsc_inclusion_labeled %>% 
  filter(cohort == params$cohort,
         id_trainers %in% c("Agree", "Somewhat Agree")|id_students %in% c("Agree", "Somewhat Agree")) %>% 
  select(id) %>% 
  drop_na()  %>% 
  distinct() %>% 
  gt() %>% 
  tab_options(table.align = "left") %>% 
  cols_label(
    id = md("**Agree/Somewhat Agree**"))
```
